name: Bug Bite!
summary: Bug Bite is an exhilarating game that puts players in the paws of a courageous squirrel on a mission to conquer a bug-infested forest. As the nimble squirrel dashes through lush environments, players must skillfully jump, slide, and use power-ups to defeat swarms of pesky bugs while collecting nuts for extra points. With vibrant visuals, challenging levels, and an infectious soundtrack, Bug Bite offers a captivating adventure for players of all ages. Get ready to embark on an epic squirrelly quest and prove your bug-bashing prowess in this action-packed, critter-crushing extravaganza!
